attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IS IT NOT TIME THIS GOVERMENT LOOKED AFTER OUR PENTIONERS. THE OLDER POPULATION OF OUR GREAT COUNTRY AS MADE IT WHAT IT IS TODAY. THEY DESERVE A LOT BETTER TREATMENT, I PETITION THAT OUR MONEY IS SPENT ON THEM, NOT ASYLUM SEEKERS.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
